column4: Hello.  Anyone having 11.10 update problem where the shutdown takes a very long time.  I've updated 3 different computers (desktop, laptop, netbook) and all three hang when the shutdown is trying to kill all processes.  It takes a few minutes before computer shuts off.
log out, ctrl-alt+F2 to get into a console
log in as root and `service lightdm stop`
then `shutdown` and see where it hangs
